projects.name: AI virtual assistant
projects.description: Developed AI-based Virtual Assistant in Python, integrating speech recognition and NLP techniques for user query comprehension. Utilized libraries like speech recognition, Google Search, and PyAudio for efficient operation. Enhanced user experience with voice command interaction, ensuring accessibility and efficiency.

projects.name: Web Clone
projects.description: Developed responsive web clones of Netflix using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Tailwind CSS. Enhanced the user interface with CSS, ensuring alignment with modern design principles and best practices. Optimized the development workflow with Tailwind CSS for streamlined styling and Bootstrap for responsive layouts.

projects.name: Performed EDA, analyzed data, and created visualizations on datasets
projects.description: Conducted exploratory data analysis (EDA) on datasets using Python's NumPy and Pandas for data manipulation and quality assurance. Created visualizations with Matplotlib, Seaborn, and developed interactive dashboards with Power BI for effective data communication.

projects.name: Smart Helmet
projects.description: Led the development of an IoT-enabled Smart Helmet to bolster worker safety through the integration of cloud computing technologies. Integrated the MQ-9 Gas Sensor for prompt detection of hazardous gases, prioritizing worker safety within the operational environment. Utilized the ESP8266 microcontroller and wireless communication modules to facilitate efficient performance and real-time data transmission within the smart helmet system.

experiences.description: During my internship at Celebal Technologies, I improve my skills in Python and build a strong understanding of SQL. I also gained hands-on experience with AWS Cloud, which really helped me grow as a Data Engineer.
